briefTitle: Dried Blood SPOT Analysis of Everolimus in Cancer Patients (SPOT-study)
officialTitle: Dried Blood SPOT Analysis of Everolimus in Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Correlation everolimus concentration DBS with whole blood
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients currently treated with everolimus for any type of cancer
* Patients from whom it is possible to collect blood samples
* At least 18 years of age
* Able and willing to sign the Informed Consent Form prior to study assessments.

Exclusion Criteria:

* None
